general.about:
As a product designer, I simplify daily workflows for users. While my primary focus is on design, I also enjoy exploring development through side projects.

My expertise in both design and development allows me to bridge the gap between these fields, fostering better collaboration and understanding.

Outside of work, you might find me skiing on the slopes or overlanding in the desert.

sideProjects.heading: InmoGolf Bonalba at InmoGolf Bonalba
sideProjects.description: Designed and developed a real estate website using Next.js 13 with their new appDir, Tailwind for the front-end and Sanity.io as a headless CMS.
sideProjects.title: InmoGolf Bonalba

sideProjects.heading: Interviewed With
sideProjects.description: Collaborated with a colleague to design and develop a responsive website using React, enabling people to share their I first-hand experiences of job interviews.
sideProjects.title: Interviewed With

workExperience.heading: Product Designer at European Union Intellectual Property Office
workExperience.description:
→ Conducted user research across the 27 EU member states through interviews, surveys, card sorting, and user testing to gather insights on workflows.
→ Enhanced the usability of existing tools by performing heuristic evaluations and user testing.
→ Designed two new tools to streamline the trademark registration process, collaborating with internal stakeholders, customers, and business analysts. Created rapid prototypes and conducted user tests in an Agile environment.
→ Communicated the benefits of a UI library to clients.
→ Collaborated closely with engineers and other designers to document and create a UI library, simplifying the translation of complex systems into tangible products.
workExperience.title: Product Designer

workExperience.heading: Product Designer at SIMPOSIUM Events
workExperience.description:
→ Conducted market research and defined new features.
→ Designed a tool to automate the creation and communication of diplomas to attendees.
→ Provided customer support while gathering and prioritizing user feedback.
→ Facilitated in-house workshops aimed at maximizing tool utilization.
→ Designed a mobile app for event searches.
→ Redesigned the landing page, resulting in a 30% increase in contacts.
workExperience.title: Product Designer

workExperience.heading: Product Designer at Travelest App (discontinued)
workExperience.description:
→ Created prototypes and conducted user tests.
→ Documented design thinking, findings, and proposals to communicate design decisions to clients.
→ Developed user requirements, wireframes, high-fidelity designs, and design specifications for the development team.
workExperience.title: Product Designer

workExperience.heading: Designer and Developer at Universidad Miguel Hernández de Elche
workExperience.description:
→ Created prototypes and conducted user tests to validate design proposals.
→ Developed 40 landing pages and their contact forms using HTML, CSS, JS, and ASP.NET.
→ Led the migration from HTML, CSS, and JS to WordPress, minimizing disruptions to daily operations and documenting the new platform for interns.
workExperience.title: Designer and Developer
